resources.string: This procedure has already been uploaded.
Could not upload: OpenMRS username/password incorrect!
Could not check username/password - no network connection.
Phone Name is blank! Must enter a phone number
Warning: reloading the database will clear all saved procedures and notifications. Proceed?
Could not acquire location. Try again.
GPS service not available. Try again.
Importing all procedures from SD card
Duplicate procedure found. Press OK to Update.
Warning: DELETING the database will clear all saved procedures and notifications. Proceed?
Warning: Load all procedures found on SD card?
Warning: RELOADING the database will clear all saved procedures and notifications. Proceed?
Patient information does not match database
All Done. What would you like to do?
Enter New Patient\'s Medical Record Number
No new procedures found. Check settings?
The network bandwidth value will be used to calculate appropriate timeouts for uploading. Enter in kilobytes per second.
Enable barcode reading of patient and physician ids.
Make education resources visible in procedures
Displays a list of all available resources
Interval at which the OpenMRS database will be cached, in hours
Scales down pictures taken with the camera.
Do not change unless using non-standard port
Hostname or IP address of MDS, do NOT add a trailing /
Notifications will be sent to the server when a task status changes.
(should be lower in poor coverage areas)
update, add, and delete available procedures
Enter the hostname of a proxy to use if required (ex: 10.10.1.100). Leave blank if not required.
Enter the port number of your proxy if required (ex: 9401). Leave blank if not required.
Encrypt data sent over the network
Folder where binary files for upload are stored
The app will display a progress dialog while uploading encounter data.
Enable a hack to send images as text to the MDS. This is a workaround for cell phone carriers which block file uploads
